name: Sword of Hrakel
overview: In this rare text adventure for the VIC-20 you have to break a curse by defeating an evil mage. However, the only thing that can do so is the Sword of Hrakel, which has been lost. It's your job to find the sword and defeat the mage to end his evil curse on the land. This was written by David Angier and Andrew Baillie, and published by Romik Software in 1983, and requires a memory expansion
